Package uansim

Class Scheduler

java.lang.Object
uansim.Scheduler
public class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object
An event priority queue
Author:
saleh

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Scheduler.Event
    A scheduled action with a corresponding description

    Test the operation of the Scheduler class

  • Field Details

    • it

      public static Scheduler it
      The one and only Scheduler object

  • Method Details

    • enableDebug

      public void enableDebug()
      Display debugging information during Scheduler operation

    • now

      public double now()
      Get the current time
      Returns:
      the current scheduler time

    • getQueueLength

      public int getQueueLength()
      Get the number of queued future events
      Returns:
      number of scheduled events waiting in the queue

    • schedule

      public Scheduler.Event schedule​(double delay, java.util.function.Consumer<Scheduler> actionFn, java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> descriptionFn)
      Schedule an event at now()+delay that is handled by the given handler and has the given description
      Parameters:
      delay - event time relative to now(), negative values are treated as zero
      actionFn - a function to handle the event
      descriptionFn - function that returns the description. this is good when the description is dynamic
      Returns:
      the event that has just been scheduled

    • handleNext

      public boolean handleNext()
      Execute the event action at the top of the event queue
      Returns:
      true if an action was executed, false if the queue has been found empty

    • handleAll

      public void handleAll()
      Execute all event actions in the event queue until the queue becomes empty. The execution of an event action can potentially enqueue further events which must also be handled before handleAll returns.

    • printQueue

      public void printQueue​(java.io.PrintStream out)
      Print the times and descriptions of all events on the event queue
      Parameters:
      out - the output stream to which the event queue should be dumped
